mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memId, memPwd, memName, memAge, memGender, memEmail, memProfile) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{memName}, #{memAge}, #{memGender}, #{memEmail}, #{memProfile})
mapper.select: select * from Member where memId=#{memId} and memPwd=#{memPwd}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET memPwd=#{memPwd}, memName=#{memName}, memAge=#{memAge}, memGender=#{memGender}, memEmail=#{memEmail} WHERE memId=#{memId}
update Member set memProfile=#{memProfile} where memId=#{memId}
